name: VMN+
tag_list: software, php, -net, java, cell-phone-apps, brew, joomla, crm, nearshore, outsourcing
overview:
VMN+ provides Web Application , E-commerce, Telecom and IT Staff Augmentation support to small, medium and large organizations across the globe.

VMN+ started in 1997 and since then organically grown to a staff of over 100 top IT professionals with 3 Million USD revenues generated from local markets.
